meanings.definition: A chemical compound consisting of two benzene rings linked together.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study biphenyls to understand their structure.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician handled the biphenyls carefully during the experiment.
meanings.sent3: Why did the biphenyls refuse to bond with other molecules? Because they preferred to stay linked together!
meanings.sent4: The biphenyls stood side by side, like inseparable twins in the world of chemicals.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the biphenyls appeared like two connected circles, forming a unique shape.

meanings.definition: Biphenyls are commonly used as heat transfer agents in various industrial applications.
meanings.sent1: The factory relied on biphenyls to keep the machines running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: Engineers tested the effectiveness of biphenyls in cooling systems.
meanings.sent3: The biphenyls at the heat transfer party were the coolest guests around!
meanings.sent4: In the world of heat exchange, biphenyls were the unsung heroes.
meanings.sent5: The biphenyls flowed through the pipes like silent conductors of thermal energy.
